categories: Category:Coruscant Security Force divisions and units

nodes.text: Tactical and Operational was a police threat assessment tactical force of the Coruscant Security Force. It would respond in the aftermath of a dangerous incident on the planet of Coruscant to provide information to the CSF Anti-Terrorism Unit at the Galactic City Strategic Center. In 40 ABY, in the aftermath of the bombing of The Elite hotel, Tactical and Operational assessed the resulting damage, including the kind of explosives that were used and how many deaths and injuries had been sustained.
Tactical and Operational first appeared in Legacy of the Force: Bloodlines published on August 29, 2006 and written by Karen Traviss.
